attributes.action: A National Referendum for the British Public to leave the EU
attributes.additional_details: That this is debated by Members of Parliament, who are able to have a FREE vote and take into account their constituents opinions and not the view of their Political Party. That the free vote is just that, and not be told which way to vote by their Political Masters. Ensuring that the ordinary member of the British Public finally has a say on membership of the European Union. Now is the time!
